name: Office Derby Project
description:
This project has been developed in one week during the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

In Office derby, you play as a developer who goes crazy and decide to destroy everything in his office. Find a weapon and rampage as many things as possible within the time limit!

We can't wait to see your best scores arrive to the leaderboard

PS: Azerty Game, don't be angry at us ;) 

PS: Leaderboard might get stuck, if so, delete the folowing file and restart the game:

AppData\Local\OfficeDerbyProject\Saved\Config\WindowsNoEditor\LootLockerSDK.ini

Made By : Adrien Resteau & Damien De Schoutheete 

Music by : Milan Meurice
